text: @adamboultonSKY @BorisJohnson @DominicRaab 1. He wasn't ill. 2. If he was ill he wasn't as ill as reported. Nobody who is at death's door is making videos the next day without being breathless, especially if still recovering from #COVID19 3. He's a lazy coward who's terrified of going against Starmer. Fact. #BorisOut
